casebody.data:
LA SOCIETE NATIONALE POUR LA RECHERCHE, LA PRODUCTION, LE TRANSPORT, LA TRANSFORMATION ET LA COMMERCIALISATION, DES HYDROCARBURES, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. SHAHEEN NATURAL RESOURCES COMPANY, INC., Defendant-Appellant. No. 1147, Docket 83-9078. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued May 9, 1984. Decided May 11, 1984. Richard deY. Manning, New York City, for defendant-appellant. Alfred Ferrer III, New York City (Shear-man & Sterling, New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff-appellee.

Before FEINBERG, Chief Judge, WINTER, Circuit Judge, and LASKER, District Judge.*

Honorable Morris E. Lasker, Senior United States District Judge for the Southern District of New York, sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM:

The judgment of the district court is affirmed for the reasons set forth in Judge Duffy’s Memorandum & Order of November 23, 1983, reported at 585 F.Supp. 57 (S.D.N.Y.1983).
